Users¶

Defines API endpoints for user operations on Nitrus Web Application.

Views¶

class users.views.RegisterView(**kwargs)¶

Contains request methods for the register view

post(request)¶
Parameters:

  • request – HttpRequest - contains signup data such as name, last name, username, password and email to create

  • database (a new user in the) –

Return: returns a fresh JWT token for the user as well as the status code

class users.views.LogInView(**kwargs)¶

Contains request methods for the log in view

post(request)¶
Parameters:

request – HttpRequest - contains the username and password that the user inputted

Returns:

if the user successfully authenticated, it will return the login serialized data, which includes username and a new JWT token. If the user failed to authenticate, it will return a status code 401

Models¶

class users.models.User(*args, **kwargs)¶

Class used to represent a user by django

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶
property token¶

None

Return: returns a SHA256 encoded JWT token which contains the username, and the expiry time

Parameters

create(validated_data)¶

  • Dictionary (validated_data -) – contains data such as first and last name, username, password and email to
